description: What could be better than a Pumpkin Spiced&nbsp;White Russian cocktail? This recipe for this delicious drink is best enjoyed during the fall and winter months. It's perfect for those chilly nights when you're sitting by the fire with some friends or even on Thanksgiving morning!
keywords: Pumpkin Spiced White Russian Cocktail Recipe
How To Pumpkin Spiced White Russian
name: Pumpkin Spiced White Russian
recipeIngredient: Whipped Cream and pumpkin pie spice for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Pour vodka, pumpkin spice creamer, and Kahlua into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour vodka, pumpkin spice creamer, and Kahlua into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well for 30 seconds or until the outside of the shaker becomes frosty.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake well for 30 seconds or until the outside of the shaker becomes frosty.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a glass, then garnish with whipped cream and pumpkin pie spice on top. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into a glass, then garnish with whipped cream and pumpkin pie spice on top. Enjoy!
